text: Beitou is a metro station on the Tamsui-Xinyi Line in Taipei, Taiwan. The station code is R22. The Xinbeitou branch line connects here and connects to Xinbeitou. == Station layout information == The station platforms are above ground level. Platform 1 is for Tamsui and Platform 2 is for Xiangshan. Platform 3 is for Daan and Platform 4 is for Xinbeitou. == Around the station == * Lady Zhou's Memorial Gate Category:Railway stations in Taipei
title: Beitou metro station
